mapper.select: select cucm_line_id from cucm_line where directory_number = #{directorynumber}
select count(1) from voice_logger_association where cucm_line_id = #{cucm_line_id}
mapper.insert: insert into voice_logger_association (CUCM_LINE_ID, STATUS_CODE, ASSOCIATE_CODE, LOGGER_DATA, COL5, COL6, COL7, COL8) values ( #{CUCM_LINE_ID}, #{STATUS_CODE}, #{ASSOCIATE_CODE}, #{LOGGER_DATA}, 1, 0, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE voice_logger_association SET status_code = #{STATUS_CODE}, associate_code = #{ASSOCIATE_CODE}, logger_data = #{LOGGER_DATA}, cucm_update_request_flag = 1, deleted = 0, lastupdate_datetime = now() WHERE cucm_line_id = #{CUCM_LINE_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT 1.directory_number, CASE WHEN v.logger_data = '0' THEN 'none' WHEN v.logger_data = '1' THEN 'all' END AS logger_data FROM cucm_line 1 INNER JOIN voice_logger_association v ON 1.cucm_line_id = v.cucm_line_id WHERE 1.deleted != '1' AND v.deleted != '1' ORDER BY 1.directory_number

SELECT c.branch_id AS ccmgrp, vorg.branch_name AS ccmgrp_nm, c.parent_section_id AS department, c.section_id AS division, vorg.parent_section_name AS department_nm, vorg.child_section_name AS division_nm, 1.directory_number AS telnum FROM cucm_line 1 INNER JOIN charge_association c ON 1.cucm_line_id = c.cucm_line_id LEFT OUTER JOIN v_organization_level vorg ON ( c.branch_id = vorg.branch_id AND c.company_id = vorg.child_company_id AND c.section_id = vorg.child_section_id ) WHERE 1.deleted = '0' AND c.deleted = '0' ORDER BY ccmgrp, department, division, telnum

SELECT DISTINCT au.last_nm AS last_name, au.first_nm AS first_name, line.directory_no AS directory_no, SUBSTR(be.mail_address, 0, INSTR(be.mail_address, '@')) AS mail_address, 'voicemail' AS voicemail FROM trn_cuc_association unity LEFT OUTER JOIN trn_phone phone ON unity.phone_id = phone.phone_id INNER JOIN rel_cucm_user_phone rup ON rup.phone_id = phone.phone_id INNER JOIN trn_user au ON rup.user_id = au.user_id INNER JOIN tmp_integratedid_employee be ON au.biz_employee_id = be.employee_cd INNER JOIN rel_cucm_phone_line rpl ON rpl.phone_id = phone.phone_id INNER JOIN trn_line line ON rpl.line_id = line.line_id WHERE rpl.no = '1' AND line.voice_mail_profile_id IS NOT NULL AND phone.delete_flg = '0' AND rpl.delete_flg = '0' AND rup.delete_flg = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT lpad(ru.section_id, 5, '0') AS section_id, a.biz_employee_id, rpl.external_phone_number_mask AS external_phone_number_mask, 1.directory_number AS directory_number, coalesce(pg.no, '') AS call_pickup_group_no, a.name_kanji AS name_kanji, rpl.dialin AS dialin, p.company_id AS company_code FROM tel_dir_association t LEFT OUTER JOIN app_user a ON t.app_user_id = a.app_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN biz_employee be ON ( a.biz_employee_id = be.employee_code AND be.executive_post_code != '003' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN r_user_section ru ON a.app_user_id = ru.app_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN r_cucm_user_phone rup ON a.app_user_id = rup.app_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cucm_phone p ON rup.cucm_phone_id = p.cucm_phone_id LEFT OUTER JOIN r_cucm_phone_line rpl ON p.cucm_phone_id = rpl.cucm_phone_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cucm_line 1 ON rpl.cucm_line_id = 1.cucm_line_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_branch mb ON mb.branch_id = p.branch_id LEFT OUTER JOIN m_cluster mc ON mc.cluster_id = mb.cluster_id LEFT OUTER JOIN pickup_group pg ON ( pg.cluster_id = mc.cluster_id AND pg.name = 1.call_pickup_group_name ) WHERE t.tel_dir_data = '1' AND t.deleted = '0' AND a.deleted = '0' AND p.deleted = '0' AND 1.deleted = '0' ORDER BY section_id, biz_employee_id

SELECT ad.user_logon_name AS user_logon_name, ad.disp_name AS disp_name, ad.last_name AS last_name, ad.first_name AS first_name, ad.mail AS mail, ad.position AS position, li.directory_number AS directory_number FROM biz_ad ad LEFT OUTER JOIN app_user au ON ad.user_logon_name = au.login_id LEFT OUTER JOIN r_cucm_user_phone up ON au.app_user_id = up.app_user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cucm_phone ph ON up.cucm_phone_id = ph.cucm_phone_id LEFT OUTER JOIN r_cucm_phone_line pl ON ph.cucm_phone_id = pl.cucm_phone_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cucm_line li ON pl.cucm_line_id = li.cucm_line_id

SELECT COALESCE(v_info.statusName, '') AS statusName, COALESCE(v_info.directoryNumber, '') AS directoryNumber, COALESCE(v_info.dialinNumber, '') AS dialinNumber, COALESCE(v_info.lineIndex, '') AS lineIndex, COALESCE(v_info.kanjiUserName, '') AS kanjiUserName, COALESCE(v_info.sectionUserName, '') AS sectionUserName, COALESCE(v_info.pickupGroupNo, '') AS pickupGroupNo, COALESCE(v_info.voiceMailFlg, '') AS voiceMailFlg, COALESCE(v_info.busyDestination, '') AS busyDestination, COALESCE(v_info.chargeAssociationBranchId, '') AS chargeAssociationBranchId, COALESCE(v_info.chargeAssociationParentSectionId, '') AS chargeAssociationParentSectionId, COALESCE(v_info.chargeAssociationSectionId, '') AS chargeAssociationSectionId, COALESCE(v_info.chargeRemarks, '') AS chargeRemarks, COALESCE(v_info.loggerDataName, '') AS loggerDataName, COALESCE(v_info.telDirData, '') AS telDirData, COALESCE(v_info.telTypeModel, '') AS telTypeModel, COALESCE(v_info.macAddress, '') AS macAddress, COALESCE(v_info.phoneButtonTemplete, '') AS phoneButtonTemplete, COALESCE(v_info.branchTelName, '') AS branchTelName, COALESCE(v_info.sectionTelName, '') AS sectionTelName, COALESCE(v_info.callingSearchSpaceName, '') AS callingSearchSpaceName, COALESCE(v_info.addonModuleName1, '') AS orgAddonModuleName1, COALESCE(v_info.addonModuleName2, '') AS orgAddonModuleName2, COALESCE(v_info.ringSettingName, '') AS orgRingSettingName, COALESCE(v_info.telLineRemarks, '') AS telLineRemarks, COALESCE(v_info.lineTextLabel, '') AS lineTextLabel, COALESCE(v_info.noansDestination, '') AS noansDestination, COALESCE(v_info.externalPhoneNumberMask, '') AS externalPhoneNumberMask FROM (
) v_info
